channel.title: Kotlin on JOSH'S BLOG
channel.description: Recent content in Kotlin on JOSH'S BLOG

item.title: Visualizing Spring Dependencies
item.description: Over the last couple of months, I have been playing with Kotlin in my spare time. To get a better feel for the language, I decided to implement a small program that reads through a POM file and diagrams all of its dependencies using Graphviz and dot.
